summary: A test suite that validates the TensorFlow implementation of the CLIP vision model, adapting generic model tests to the specifics of CLIP where certain inputs like token IDs are not used, and checking configuration, forward pass signatures, attention and hidden state outputs, pretrained loading, and saved model creation.
business_intent: Guarantee the functional correctness and robustness of the CLIP vision component in TensorFlow deployments, enabling reliable integration into applications that rely on visual feature extraction.
